text: qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: sddaqna biallah watena, fala rabi lana ghyrh, wala mebwd lana swah, wamnna bialwahy aldhy 'anzalah allah elyna, waladhi 'anzalah ealaa 'iibrahim khlyl allh, wabnyh 'ismaebl w'ishaq, wabn aibnih yaequb bin 'ishaq, waladhi 'anzalah ealaa alasbat -whm al'anbia' aldhyn kanuu fi qabayil bani 'iisrayiyl alathnty eshrt min walad yeqwb- wama 'uwti musaa waeisaa min altawrat wal'injyl, wama 'anzalah allah ealaa anbyayh, numin bdhlk klh, wala nufariq bayn 'ahad mnhm, wanahn lilah wahdah mnqadwn baltaet, muqirrun lah balrbwbyt walalwhyt walebadt
